## Vector3.Hermite() method

Returns a new Vector3 located for "amount" (float) on the Hermite interpolation spline defined by the vectors "value1", "tangent1", "value2", "tangent2"

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Hermite(value1: ReadOnlyVector3, tangent1: ReadOnlyVector3, value2: ReadOnlyVector3, tangent2: ReadOnlyVector3, amount: number): Vector3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value1 | <code>ReadOnlyVector3</code> | defines the first control point |
|  tangent1 | <code>ReadOnlyVector3</code> | defines the first tangent vector |
|  value2 | <code>ReadOnlyVector3</code> | defines the second control point |
|  tangent2 | <code>ReadOnlyVector3</code> | defines the second tangent vector |
|  amount | <code>number</code> | defines the amount on the interpolation spline (between 0 and 1) |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector3`

the new Vector3
